tool_description: Find the Logo of each company in real-time. Using our logo finder service is entirely free with attribution. A link back to companyurlfinder.com is required on any page the service is used.

api_list.name: Logo API
api_list.description: This API allows users to retrieve the logo of a specified company by providing its domain name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name of the company whose logo is to be retrieved.
